main event: A sighting of multiple unidentified aerial objects in Platte City, Missouri on February 7, 1955.
interesting points: The sighting involved 5 to 6 objects that changed positions several times and formed a 'Y' formation., The objects were visually compared to the size of large jet aircraft and were yellowish-white in color., They emitted a sound that was more reciprocating than a jet., The objects appeared low on the horizon and faded from sight as they climbed., A telephone check with Grandview AFB confirmed no aircraft formations at the time of the sighting.
witness description: Civilians first noticed the objects while in a car.
